sprite.name: Lois
sprite.look: Lois is a schoolteacher and an eager participant in the personal computing revolution.

sprite.name: lampPost
sprite.look: The lamp is out. It is dark, and a little scary.

verb.name: Remember
verb.behavior: It wasn't always like this. There was something in the lamp that lit the house...

verb.name: Forget
verb.behavior: Maybe it has always been like this.

verb.name: Play
verb.behavior: It's too dark, swinging around the lamp post like a monkey will have to wait.

sprite.name: moon
sprite.look: It looks familiar, but smaller and dimmer. Enough moonlight to walk by, but that's about it.

verb.name: Forget
verb.behavior: Once forgotten, it's like a whole new moon.

verb.name: Play
verb.behavior: There's a game called "Pretend to Remember a Visit to the Moon." It's a one-player game.

sprites.sprite:
looseFireflies loose fireflies> A swarm of fireflies. Tiny flying beetles who make their rear ends glow. Why? Maybe just for fun.
These fireflies will help light the lamp.

sprite.name: moonStars
sprite.look: Some are further away than others.

sprite.name: moonFountain
sprite.look: It looks familiar but somehow ... smaller? Could be a trick of the moonlight.

sprite.name: dome
sprite.look: It's a protective dome. A masterful blow could crack it open, but those fireflies are trapped for now.

sprite.name: moonFireflyCluster
sprite.look: A swarm of fireflies trapped in a dome on the moon. They seem anxious.

verb.name: Remember
verb.behavior: These fireflies used to live in the lamp outside the house. Now it's just a matter of getting them out from this dome.

verb.name: Forget
verb.behavior: Hard to say where these fireflies came from.

verb.name: Play
verb.behavior: The fireflies are so anxious under that dome, they don't seem interested in playing.

sprite.name: brokenDome
sprite.look: The dome is cracked open.

verb.name: Remember
verb.behavior: Fireflies used to be trapped in this dome, but now it's cracked wide open.

verb.name: Play
verb.behavior: It would be dangerous to play around this broken glass.

sprite.name: fountain
sprite.look: It takes care to maintain a fountain like this. It's at the center of the yard, the focal point of this domestic garden.

verb.name: Remember
verb.behavior: This fountain has been here for at least 20 years, a tranquilizing presence in the back yard.

verb.name: Play
verb.behavior: Not allowed to play in the fountain.

sprite.name: smallFlowerPots

sprite.name: backyardStars

sprite.name: window
sprite.look: It looks familiar, but smaller.

sprite.name: table
sprite.look: The table looks unstable.

sprite.name: jar
sprite.look: A jar full of fireflies.

verb.name: Remember
verb.behavior: These fireflies have come a long way.

sprite.name: floppyDisk
sprite.look: It's a floppy disk copy of "Rocky's Boots" for the Apple II.

sprite.name: painting
sprite.look: It's a watercolor painting of a vine growing up through a manhole. In the background there's a fire hydrant. It's a crude rendition, but there's something familiar about it; that fire hydrant almost looks touchable.

sprite.name: computer
sprite.look: It's an Apple II. A programmable machine, from a more civilized age.

sprite.name: computerScreen
sprite.look: The screen is dark, nothing's running right now.

sprite.name: computerScreenRockysBoots
sprite.look: Rocky's Boots is running on the computer right now. It's a diagram of a kicking machine.

verb.name: Learn
verb.behavior: The player of "Rocky's Boots" learns to build a machine that kicks. Through this process, one can learn more about both electronics and kicking.
